items.name: SkyXhub Marketplace
items.text: A SaaS based Travel agent portal A NEXT-GENERATION B2B TRAVEL ECOSYSTEM DESIGNED TO EMPOWER agencies with centralized access to global inventory, seamless booking workflows, and intelligent management tools.

items.name: Content API (Aggregator API)
items.text: A developer-ready API that consolidates NDC content across multiple carriers, enabling seamless integration and access to competitive fares and ancillary services with real-time inventory

items.name: Website Development Services
items.text: Professionally engineered travel websites (dynamic/static) tailored to agency-specific workflows, branding, and operational needs with Security Enhancements and Technological Excellence.

items.name: White Label Travel Platform
items.text: A fully own branded solution, rapidly deployable digital storefront that enables agencies to launch their own B2B Travel Portal with minimal infrastructure overhead.

items.name: NDC API Integration
items.text: Direct API connectivity for agencies with signed airline agreements, unlocking exclusive NDC content and enabling full control over NDC-enabled Booking the booking lifecycle.
